TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlWorkflowInstanceStore extends System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore
Public NotInheritable Class SqlWorkflowInstanceStore Inherits InstanceStore

summary.span: 派生自持久性功能的抽象 类，并提供实现以允许将实例状态信息保存到 SQL Server 2005 或 SQL Server 2008 数据库，或从该数据库中加载实例状态信息。

span.span: Derives from the abstract class of the persistence functionality and provides implementation to allow saving instance state information to and loading instance state information from an SQL Server 2005 or SQL Server 2008 database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 序列化复杂类型；要与此实例存储区一起保留的工作流中所使用的所有类型都必须可通过使用 进行序列化。 uses the to serialize complex types; all types used in workflows to be persisted with this instance store must be serializable using . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 。The following code sample demonstrates creating a . 此示例来自 [持久性参与者](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/persistence-participants) 示例。This example is from the [Persistence Participants](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/persistence-participants) sample.

summary.span: 指定时间段，宿主必须在该时间段内续订其在工作流服务实例上的锁。

span.span: Specifies the time period within which the host renews its lock on a workflow service instance.
The time period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果宿主没有在此时间段中使用此属性续订锁（换句话说，延长租约），此持久性提供程序将解除实例锁定，另一个宿主可以锁定该实例。If the host does not renew the lock (in other words, extend the lease) with this in this time period, the persistence provider unlocks the instance and another host may lock the instance. 值的格式为 "hh： mm： ss"。The value is a of the form "hh:mm:ss". 允许的最小值为 "00:00:01" (1 秒钟) 。The minimum permitted value is "00:00:01" (1 sec). 此属性的默认值为 "00:00:30" (30 秒) 。The default value of this property is "00:00:30" (30 seconds). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 中使用 HostLockRenewalPeriod。The following code sample demonstrates using HostLockRenewalPeriod in a . 此示例来自 [内置配置](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration) 示例。This example is from the [Built-in Configuration](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_BuiltInConfiguration#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_builtinconfiguration/cs/program.cs#1)]

summary.span: 指定要在工作流实例完成后采取的操作。

span.span: Specifies the action to be taken after a workflow instance completes.

summary.span: 可能的值为“DeleteNothing”和“DeleteAll”。

span.span: Possible values are "DeleteNothing" and "DeleteAll".

summary.span: 默认值为“DeleteAll”。

span.span: The default value is "DeleteAll".

summary.span: 如果该属性设置为“DeleteNothing”，则持久性提供程序将在工作流实例完成后将所有实例数据和元数据保留在持久性数据库中。

span.span: If the property is set to "DeleteNothing", the persistence provider keeps all the instance data and metadata in the persistence database after the workflow instance completes.

summary.span: 如果该属性设置为“DeleteAll”，则持久性提供程序将在工作流实例完成后删除所有实例数据和元数据。

span.span: If the property is set to "DeleteAll", the persistence provider deletes all the instance data and metadata after the workflow instance completes.

value.span: 要在工作流完成后采取的操作。

span.span: The action to be taken after a workflow completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的值为“DeleteNothing”和“DeleteAll”。Possible values are "DeleteNothing" and "DeleteAll". 默认值为“DeleteAll”。The default value is "DeleteAll". 如果该属性设置为“DeleteNothing”，则持久性提供程序将在工作流实例完成后将所有实例数据和元数据保留在持久性数据库中。If the property is set to "DeleteNothing", the persistence provider keeps all the instance data and metadata in the persistence database after the workflow instance completes. 如果该属性设置为“DeleteAll”，则持久性提供程序将在工作流实例完成后删除所有实例数据和元数据。If the property is set to "DeleteAll", the persistence provider deletes all the instance data and metadata after the workflow instance completes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 中使用 InstanceCompletionAction。The following code sample demonstrates using InstanceCompletionAction in a . 此示例来自 [内置配置](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration) 示例。This example is from the [Built-in Configuration](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_BuiltInConfiguration#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_builtinconfiguration/cs/program.cs#1)]

summary.span: 指定一个值，该值指示是否必须对实例数据进行压缩。

span.span: Specifies a value that indicates whether the instance data must be compressed.
The possible values are "None" and "GZip".
The default is "None".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该值设置为 "GZip"，则使用 GZip 算法压缩实例数据。If the value is set to "GZip", the instance data is compressed using the GZip algorithm. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 中使用 InstanceEncodingOption。The following code sample demonstrates using InstanceEncodingOption in a . 此示例来自 [内置配置](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration) 示例。This example is from the [Built-in Configuration](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration) sample. summary.span: 指定要在持久性提供程序捕获 时采取的操作。

span.span: Specifies the action to be taken when the persistence provider catches an .

value.span: 要在持久性提供程序捕获 时采取的操作。

span.span: The action to be taken when the persistence provider catches an

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定服务宿主应在工作流服务实例遇到 时采取什么操作。Specify what action a service host should take when a workflow service instance experiences an . 服务主机在其尝试锁定已由另一个所有者锁定的实例时收到 。The service host receives an when it tries to lock an instance that is already locked by another owner. 以下列表中列出了可能的值：The possible values are in the following list: - **无**。**None**. 服务主机不会尝试锁定实例，并将 传递给调用方。The service host does not attempt to lock the instance and passes the to the caller. - **BasicRetry**。**BasicRetry**. 服务主机将使用线性重试间隔重新尝试锁定实例，并在序列结尾将异常传递给调用方。The service host reattempts to lock the instance with a linear retry interval and passes the exception to the caller at the end of the sequence. - **AggressiveRetry**。**AggressiveRetry**. 服务主机将使用按指数增长的延迟时间重新尝试锁定实例，并在序列结尾将 传递给调用方。The service host reattempts to lock the instance with an exponentially increasing delay and passes the to the caller at the end of the sequence. 在开始尽可能快地尝试获取锁定时，这些间隔很短，而且每次尝试不成功后，这些间隔将增大。The intervals are short in the beginning in an attempt to acquire the lock as quickly as possible and the intervals gets bigger with every unsuccessful attempt. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 中使用 InstanceLockedExceptionAction。The following code sample demonstrates using InstanceLockedExceptionAction in a . 此示例来自 [内置配置](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration) 示例。This example is from the [Built-in Configuration](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_BuiltInConfiguration#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_builtinconfiguration/cs/program.cs#1)]

summary.span: 将指定的属性与工作流实例相关联，以便能够基于这些属性的特定值查询实例。

span.span: Associates the specified properties with a workflow instance so that you can query for instances based on specific values for these properties.

summary.span: 可在外部查询中使用的这些属性可以是简单的类型（例如：Int64、String 等），也可以是序列化的二进制类型 (byte[])。

span.span: These properties that can be used in external queries can be of simple types (for example: Int64, String, and so on) or of a serialized binary type (byte[]).

summary.span: 二进制属性通常用于存储跟踪数据。

span.span: Binary properties are typically used to store tracking data.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 中使用 Promote。The following code sample demonstrates using Promote in a . 此示例来自 [sqlstoreextensibility.exe](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/sqlstoreextensibility) 示例。This example is from the [SQLStoreExtensibility](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/sqlstoreextensibility) sample. MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod : TimeSpan with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 指定时间段，在该时间段后，SQL 工作流实例存储区将运行一个检测任务，来检测上一检测周期后持久性数据库中的任何可运行或可激活的工作流实例。

span.span: Specifies the time period after which the SQL Workflow Instance Store runs a detection task to detect any runnable or activatable workflow instances in the persistence database after the previous detection cycle.
Returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 运行一个内部任务，该任务将定期苏醒并检查持久性数据库中是否存在任何可运行的实例。The runs an internal task that periodically wakes up and checks if any runnable instances exist in the persistence database. 如果某个实例未处于挂起状态或完成状态并且满足以下条件，则该实例可 *运行*：An instance is *runnable*, if it is not in the suspended state or the completed state and satisfies the following conditions: - 实例处于解除锁定状态，并且具有已过期的挂起计时器。The instance is unlocked and has a pending timer that has expired. - 实例处于解除锁定状态，并且其状态为 "正在 **执行**"。The instance is unlocked and its status is **Executing**. - 实例上的锁已过期。The instance has an expired lock on it. 当 SQL 工作流实例存储在数据库中找到可运行的实例并同时找到能够加载在计算机上运行的实例的工作流宿主时，它将引发 。The SQL Workflow Instance Store raises the when it finds a runnable instance in the database and also finds a workflow host capable of loading the instance running on the computer. 当工作流宿主收到此事件时，它将针对实例存储执行 ，以将该实例加载到内存中。When a workflow host receives this event, it executes the against the instance store to load the instance into the memory. 属性的类型为 TimeSpan，值的格式为 "hh： mm： ss"。The type of the property is TimeSpan and the value is of the form "hh:mm:ss". 最小值为 "00:00:01" (1 秒钟) 。The minimum value is "00:00:01" (1 sec). 如果省略，则默认为 "00:00:05" (5 秒) 。If omitted, defaults to "00:00:05" (5 secs). 此参数为可选参数。This parameter is an optional parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 中使用 RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod。The following code sample demonstrates using RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod in a . 此示例来自 [内置配置](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration) 示例。This example is from the [Built-in Configuration](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_BuiltInConfiguration#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_builtinconfiguration/cs/program.cs#1)]
